title.narrative: Multitranche Financing Facility (MFF) - National Power Grid Development Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The investment program is designed to benefit all grid-connected consumers with adequate and reliable supply of electricity and is expected to support the achievement of the Government's goal of Power for all by 2012 by increasing transmission capacity and enhancing the reliability and efficiency of the transmission network.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Enhanced transmission network reliability and efficiency through expansion and augmentation of the national transmission grid.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Increased interregional transmission capacity from 14,100 MW in March 2007 to more than 37,000 MW by 2012.

description.narrative: Enhanced transmission network reliability and efficiency through expansion and augmentation of the national transmission grid.

title.narrative: Maintain transmission losses in the range of 3-4% at par with international standards.

description.narrative: Enhanced transmission network reliability and efficiency through expansion and augmentation of the national transmission grid.

title.narrative: Development of an integrated national power grid with additional 60,000 ckm transmission lines by 2012.

description.narrative: Enhanced transmission network reliability and efficiency through expansion and augmentation of the national transmission grid.

title.narrative: Maintain transmission system availability at not less than 99.0%.

description.narrative: Enhanced transmission network reliability and efficiency through expansion and augmentation of the national transmission grid.
